description:
Learn to develop iOS Apps in only 1 hour with absolutely no coding, design, or development skills necessary.


Have you ever wanted to make your own iPhone apps, but have no idea where to start? Either you don't have the time, the computer know-how, or simply just don't have any idea what the next step would even look like to make it a reality?

My name is Sam Knox. I'm a designer and app developer, and I want to teach you how to build and distribute your very own iOS apps without any coding, design, or development skills whatsoever. All you'll need to participate, are your great ideas.

DO IT YOURSELF APP CLASS consists of 12 short easy to follow step-by-step video based lectures. In only about 1 hour 1/2, you will learn all the essential tools and knowledge necessary to transform your great ideas into realized iOS applications for iPhones, iPads, and iPod devices, that the whole world can enjoy.

What you can expect to learn:

• Why app development is such an essential modern day skill.
• How to get up and running immediately with the Apple Developer Program and iTunes Connect (the launch pad for all iOS apps).
• How to find fantastic and profitable app ideas.
• How to design and build your app (without any artistic skills or technical knowledge).
• An introduction to freelancing, and a step-by-step guide to Elance.
• How to hire a freelancer, and how to work with them throughout the app building process.
• How to submit your app to the itunes app store, and what to expect along the way.
• How to effectively promote, market, and price your app.
• Long term app maintenance.

The course also provides additional guides and eBooks as a bonus, including "75 Ways To Promote Your App," the essential app promotion and marketing tool, that includes links tips and tricks to effective app promotion, and important site checklists so you can get to work immediately.

Upon completion of this course, you will immediately be able to design, develop, distribute, market, and maintain your very own iPhone, iPad, and iPod apps.

title: Do It Yourself App Class (iOS) With No Skills Necessary
